title: (x) Kelowna Dragon Boat Festival 2004 - hand lettered {Dav}
content:
Could anyone tell me what font the header is using please   
   
 [http://www.kelownadragonboatfestival.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054729/http:/www.kelownadragonboatfestival.com/)   
   
thank you
author: wallaby

comments.content:
It seems the server over there is not working properly, right now..   
_Sorry, but the site is currently not 'visible', to me at least.._

strange. I've copied it i hope this attachment works   
   
 ![font identification](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054729im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69064.gif)

_Thanks, Yea, This sample should do.._   
Well, Sadly enough, I think this may as well be custom lettering..
aww :|. I looked closely and i think you might be correct because the two 'A's aren't same at all

If you are looking for something similar, you might look at [ITC Kendo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054729/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kendo/itc-kendo/testdrive.html?s=DRAGON+BOAT&p=48). It also has decorative initials, not shown in the Test drive.

I entered a poster in a contest for the Calgary Dragon Boat Festival a couple of years ago - I used [John Handy](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054729/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/john-handy/john-handy/testdrive.html?s=DRAGON+BOAT&p=48) for the headline. They didn't use my entry, but the next year, they cropped out the graphic and set the headline in [one of those god awful Chinese fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054729/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=takeout&page=&nb_ppp_old=10&text=DRAGON+BOAT&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) that border on racist. I never even got paid for the use of my graphic.   
   
Hmm... I don't really know where I was going with this. I guess it's good to see the use of some better brush scripts than Takeout for Asian cultural events.   
   
 - Lex
